00001 //simple template class that keep track of the
00002 //minimum keyed pair
00003 template <class TKey,class TData> class TMinPair
00004 {
00005 public:
00006   
00007     TMinPair() : m_bLive(false){};
00008     TKey Key(){return m_Key;};
00009     TData Data(){return m_Data;};
00010     bool Valid(){return m_bLive;};
00011 
00012     void Update(const TKey & NewKey, const TData & NewData)
00013     {
00014         if(NewKey<m_Key || m_bLive==false)
00015         {
00016             m_bLive = true;
00017             m_Key = NewKey;
00018             m_Data = NewData;
00019         }
00020     }
00021 
00022 private:
00023     TKey m_Key;
00024     TData m_Data;
00025     bool m_bLive;
00026 
00027 };
